story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Pattern Library | MailChimp
caption: ux.mailchimp.com
description: The MailChimp Pattern Library is a byproduct of our move to a responsive, nimble, and intuitive app. Constant iteration requires both an efficient workflow and a well defined collection of atomic elements that can assemble new UIs quickly without accruing new technical or design debt.
